issue.message: The drawable "app_logo" in drawable-night has no declaration in the base `drawable` folder or in a `drawable-`*density*`dpi` folder; this can lead to crashes when the drawable is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.
